title: PLAZA / GASTON rene dead barks
description: René has passed away and Gaston is sitting on a bench.

dialogueTree.title: Gaston Martin: ""Never thought I'd miss that angry..."
dialogueTree.english: "Never thought I'd miss that angry prick..."
dialogueTree.polish: „Nie myślałem, że kiedyś zatęsknię za tym nienawistnym dupkiem...”
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Я не думаў, што калі-небудзь засумую па гэтым ненавісным ідзіёце..."

dialogueTree.title: Gaston Martin: ""I wonder if Leo knows pétanque...""
dialogueTree.polish: „Ciekawe, czy Leo umie grać w pétanque...”
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Цікава, ці Лео ўмее гуляць у петанк..."

dialogueTree.title: Gaston Martin: ""Maybe fishing... or crossword puzz..."
Gaston Martin: ""Have the days always been this lon..."
dialogueTree.english: "Have the days always been this long?"

dialogueTree.title: Gaston Martin: ""I should be hungry -- why am I not..."
dialogueTree.english: "I should be hungry -- why am I not hungry?"
dialogueTree.polish: „Powinienem być głodny. To dlaczego nie jestem?”
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Павінен быць галодны. Дык чаму ж я не?"
